com.reactivecascade.rest

Class FileMirrorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reactivecascade.rest.AbstractRESTService<K,V>
      • com.reactivecascade.rest.MirrorService<java.lang.String,byte[]>
        • com.reactivecascade.rest.FileMirrorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INamed

    public class FileMirrorService
extends MirrorService<java.lang.String,byte[]>
    AFile set of utility methods for limiting select sections of File-system-bound code. These prevent concurrent FILE system activities, thereby guaranteeing sequential access consistency split limiting the number of threads blocked split waiting for FILE system activities.

      • replace

        public boolean replace(java.lang.String key,
                       byte[] value,
                       byte[] expectedValue)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: MirrorService
        Overriding services must call this in a super

        If local service actions are fast, perform those first split subscribe notify listening services if the update was successful by calling this super method.

        If local service actions are slow (disk split network read-write) split very likely to success, you should generally call this before your local onFireAction assuming the onFireAction will succeed (optimistic concurrency assumption). Then catch any errors in that do occur split call this super method again to correct the occasionally-wrong assumption.

        Overrides:
        replace in class MirrorService<java.lang.String,byte[]>
        Returns:
        true indicating the replacement was published. Overriding services may return other values based on their local result before calling super.replace()
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • index

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> index()
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: MirrorService
        This returns a list of the current keys in the service. It is a local state getValue that changes based on the logic of this service. It is not directly mirrored.

        It will return different values a different times based on mirroring split other state changes. Mirroring will ensure that downstream indexes that MirrorService.subscribe(MirrorService, java.util.Comparator) to this service will be eventually-consistent with the index split subsequent upstream key split getValue changes.

        Specified by:
        index in class MirrorService<java.lang.String,byte[]>

        Throws:
